Installation
============

This section will guide you through setting up the HistoART environment.

Prerequisites
-------------
- Linux (Ubuntu 22.04 LTS recommended)
- Python 3.10+
- Git

Steps
-----
1. **Clone the Repository**

   Open your terminal and run:

   .. code-block:: bash

      git clone https://github.com/mousavikahaki/HistoART.git
      cd HistoART

2. **Create a Virtual Environment and Install Dependencies**

   Using Pythonâ€™s built-in venv:

   .. code-block:: bash

      python3 -m venv histoart_env
      source histoart_env/bin/activate

   Then install the required packages:

   .. code-block:: bash

      pip install -r requirements.txt

   _Tested Environment:_ Linux (Ubuntu 22.04 LTS) and Python 3.10+
